name: MySponsorSays
0:
”Alexa open my sponsor says”
”Alexa ask my sponsor says to share some recovery”
”Alexa, ask my sponsor says about meetings in Long Beach”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my sponsor says
des:
Open My Sponsor Says

Space Facts provides fun the 12 step community should enjoy

To start, just say "Alexa, launch My Sponsor Says" or "Alexa, open My Sponsor Says" to get a recovery saying".

Also, by saying "Alexa, ask my sponsor says about meetings in Long Beach", the next In-Person meeting for today is spoken back for this city.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
